thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home away from home
thread.title_full: Home away from home - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: John W
title: Home away from home
text:
With an office in San Mateo - I need a hotel that is convenient to the airport and office.
This Marriott is terrific ... modern rooms, renovated, nicely appointed and great friendly staff that understand what service is.
Admittedly I am now a regular here but without fail they look after me with regular room upgrades and M-Lounge access.
When you're traveling on business you look for a room that's clean and comfortable, friendly staff, good and prompt room service and general all round service from valet parking to house-keeping.
This hotel ticks all the boxes. Well done guys ... you have earned my loyalty.
